title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: Currently, the report design stores the absolute path of the library include. For example, <property name='fileName' value='E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'/>.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design. For example, the relative path should be saved as <property name='fileName' value='$project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'/>.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open a report design in the BIRT designer.
2. Include a library from a different location in the project.
3. Verify that the BIRT designer generates and saves the relative path for the library include.
